_meta.description: Revised approach after R1 failure - metal displaced from scaffold
lessons_from_r1: Metal stayed at origin while scaffold moved away
Disconnected motif chains (E1, E2, D3, D4, N5) not properly scaffolded
Need simpler approach: just metal+ligand with burial conditioning

r2a_simple_buried_metal._description: Simplest approach: just TB+CIT, strong burial, let RFD3 decide coordination
r2a_simple_buried_metal._hypothesis: RFD3 should naturally place coordinating residues around buried metal

r2b_hbond_citrate._description: Add H-bond acceptor conditioning on citrate oxygens
r2b_hbond_citrate._hypothesis: Force protein to H-bond with citrate, improving interaction

r2c_unfixed_citrate._description: Unfix both metal and citrate for co-diffusion
r2c_unfixed_citrate._hypothesis: Let citrate move with scaffold to find optimal position
